        public void setArguments(ArgumentHash arguments)
        Sets the arguments the script should be run with. These will persist with every consecutive run.

      • getEnvironmentMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getEnvironmentMap()

      • execute

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> execute()
                                         throws java.io.IOException,
                                                PythonException,
                                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        Executes the python script with any previously set arguments. This function blocks until completion.
        Returns:
        A list of strings with the python script's output (each line is an entry).
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        PythonException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • start

        public void start()
           throws AlreadyRunningException,
                  java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        AlreadyRunningException
        java.io.IOException

      • tell

        public java.util.concurrent.Future tell(java.lang.String command)
                                 throws NoProcessException
        If there is a running process, submits the given command and returns the outputted response. All previous outputs are dropped.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to send to the process. Use newlines at your own risk.
        Returns:
        The single line output printed after the command is run. (Multiple lines can't work because we don't know how long the process will print for)
        Throws:
        NoProcessException - If there is no process currently running.

      • waitForCompletion

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> waitForCompletion()

                                                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                                          PythonException,
                                                          java.io.IOException
        Throws:
        NoProcessException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        PythonException
        java.io.IOException
